amendatorysection.para: A credit card bank shall be subject to the Interstate Branching and Merger Act, the Nebraska Bank Holding Company Act of 1995, the Nebraska Banking Act, and Chapter 8, articles 5, 6, 7, 8, 13, 14, 15, 16, 19, and 20, unless otherwise limited or excluded or the context otherwise requires.

crossreference.para: Interstate Branching and Merger Act, see section 8-2101.
Nebraska Bank Holding Company Act of 1995, see section 8-908.
